item.title: Call and Apply Methods in JavaScript
item.description: The call and apply methods in JavaScript might look complicated at first glance, but they are actually easy to wrap your head around. Suppose we have an object called square with a few properties: var square = { color: "red", getColor: function () { return "I am the color " + this.color + "!"; }, getArea: function (width, height) { return "My area is " + (width * height) + " feet!
